LanguageData.TurretHuntToggle_desc: hen enabled, turret will automatically fire on passive wild animals.\nAdded by the Turret Hunt mod.
LanguageData.TurretHuntDesignatedToggle_desc: When enabled, turret will automatically fire on only designated wild animals.\nAdded by the Turret Hunt mod.
LanguageData.TurretHuntKillDownedToggle_desc: When enabled, turret will automatically fire on downed passive wild animals.\nAdded by the Turret Hunt mod.
